entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to 16 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then mainly cloudy. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to 16 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
